alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Franklin; Union (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 5:20PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHERN FRANKLIN COUNTY, SOUTHERN UNION COUNTY, AND SOUTHEASTERN FAYETTE COUNTY IN INDIANA THROUGH 545 PM EDT... At 519 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Connersville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Connersville, Brookville, Liberty, Salem, Blooming Grove, Columbia, Metamora, Bunker Hill, Laurel, Cedar Grove, Dunlapsville, Alquina, Whitewater State Park, Mounds State Recreation Area, Billingsville, Alpine, Nulltown, Peppertown, Everton and Springersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
